clinical_study.brief_title: Effectiveness of a Online Training Program With a Clinical Procedure Standardized in Units of Nursing (CPSUN)
clinical_study.official_title: Effectiveness of a Online Training Program With a Clinical Procedure Standardized: "Blood Culture in Units of Nursing". Quasi-experimental Study

brief_summary.textblock: This study evaluates if the implementation of an online platform with procedures and protocols, improve the knowledge of professionals and can have a health impact related to decreased contamination of blood cultures.

detailed_description.textblock:
This is a Quasi-experimental study, with parallel groups (experimental and control).
The aim of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of an Online Learning Platform used by nurses to improve the results of a blood culture technique. The online learning tool is studied in two of four internal medicine units of a tertiary hospital in Madrid. These two units have similar characteristics of personnel, materials and structure. Both units are at a great distance, preventing a professional talk to each other.

primary_outcome.measure: Analyze number of contaminated cultures in the control and experimental group before intervention and after the learning obtained with the Online Training Platform (Elsevier Clinical Skills).
primary_outcome.description: The results obtained in each study arm (contaminated cultures) are compared six months before the intervention (No Intervention Arm/control group) and 3 months later (Experimental Arm).

secondary_outcome.measure: To evaluate the improvement in the learning of the nurses of the blood culture technique.
secondary_outcome.description: The improvement in the learning of the technique is measured with a test created ad hoc validated by an expert panel.

secondary_outcome.measure: Know the degree of adherence to the Online Learning Platform (Elsevier Clinical Skills).
secondary_outcome.description: It analyzes the number of accesses and tools of the Online Platform used by the nurses.

arm_group.description: Participants receives an individual online training of extraction of blood culture for 3 months (This platform aims to improve knowledge and skills), they are sent 3 homework (one per month) and are evaluated at the end of each.
Participants don´t receives an individual online training of extraction of blood culture.Do their work as usual.

intervention.description: The professionals with participant in the experimental arm receive an online training of a technique of extraction of blood culture and other arm the professionals no receive any training. They work as usual.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Be nurse of the nursing unit selected.
- Foreseeing to remain in service during the study.
- Acceptance of voluntary participation in the study, prior information.
- Signature of informed consent.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Those professionals who for reasons beyond their control are transferred to other services or are on leave (in any form). They can not complete the various phases of the study.
- Professionals who, for whatever reason, decide to withdraw their consent to participate in the study.
